description: This file is a shell script for managing syslog and firewall logs, including compression, uncompression, log rotation, and maintenance tasks on a Cisco-based device. It handles log file archiving, moving old logs, and setting up log directories.

methods.name: old_sysevtlog_handle
methods.description: Archives and compresses system or event logs, moving them into a timestamped archive.

methods.name: old_fwlog_handle
methods.description: Merges old firewall logs into a compressed archive for storage.

methods.name: createSystemAndEventLogFolder
methods.description: Creates directories and configuration for system and event logs based on syslog configuration.

methods.name: get_log_file
methods.description: Retrieves the path for system or event logs, with fallback logic.

methods.name: remove_log
methods.description: Removes log files or directories specified.

methods.name: compress
methods.description: Compresses specified logs (syslog, eventlog, fwlog) into archive files.

methods.name: uncompress
methods.description: Decompresses a given archive file into target directory.
